title: Successful login with valid email and password
steps: Open the app on the login screen
Enter a valid email address in the email field
Enter a valid password in the password field
expectedResults: User is redirected to the Home screen
User sees a welcome message on the Home screen

title: Error displayed when logging in with invalid password
steps: Open the app on the login screen
Enter a valid email address in the email field
Enter an invalid password in the password field
expectedResults: An error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials
User remains on the login screen

title: Login button disabled until both email and password fields are filled
steps: Open the app on the login screen
Leave email and password fields blank and observe the Login button
Fill only the email field with a valid email and observe the Login button
Clear email field, fill only the password field with any value and observe the Login button
Fill both email and password fields with valid values
expectedResults: Login button is disabled when both fields are blank
Login button remains disabled when only email field is filled
Login button remains disabled when only password field is filled
Login button becomes enabled when both fields have non-empty values
